benchmark_details.name: Wan Juan
benchmark_details.overview: A large-scale multimodal dataset composed of both Chinese and English data, collected from a wide range of web sources, including text, image-text, and video modalities, with a total volume exceeding 2TB.

purpose_and_intended_users.goal: To provide a high-quality dataset for training large models and studying various multimodal tasks.

data.source: Collected from a wide range of web sources including text, images, and videos.
data.annotation: Filtered for content safety, high quality, and value alignment through algorithmic processing and manual verification.

methodology.calculation: The dataset was processed based on specific rules for quality assessment and value alignment.
methodology.interpretation: High-quality data was ensured through methods such as deduplication and harmful content filtering.
methodology.validation: Ensured through manual verification and algorithmic processing.
